hanzi-su-wiki:
需

Значения

Требовать; требование, заказ

Мнемоника

Корни растений 而 требуют дождя 雨.
purpleculture_pinyin:
xū
to require; to need; to want; necessity; need
требовать; нуждаться; хотеть; необходимость; необходимость
rtega_mnemonic:
需需RSneed, require, must, hesitate, consider
  • RS. hesitate and consider whether it will rain 雨 while stroking the beard 而; need comes afterward because one has waited for too long
  • all falling: the rain 雨, the beard 而 and 而 the need 需
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: Rain 雨 needed for crops to grow
purpleculture_examples:
需要 [ xū yào ]: to need; to want; to demand; to require; requirement; need
需求 [ xū qiú ]: requirement; to require; (economics) demand
急需 [ jí xū ]: to urgently need; urgent need
内需 [ nèi xū ]: domestic demand
必需 [ bì xū ]: to need; to require; essential; indispensable
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 雨 [ yǔ ] rain
    • 而 [ ér ] and, and then, and yet; but
heisig_chinese_memo: When it rains, the need for combs goes up to deal with wet hair.
heisig_story: The sense of demand is best captured by thinking of the economic principle of "supply and demand." The primitives: rain . . . comb.
koohiiStory1: Supply and demand is a simple concept: when it rains, the demand for combs goes up to deal with wet hair.
koohiiStory2: If it´s raining combs, then the demand for them sure does drop.
jp_example_words:
需要(じゅよう): demand, request
必需品(ひつじゅひん): necessities, necessary article, requisite, essential
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In the rain I take my rake and shake it, making a demand that the rain stop! I demand this rain stop right now! Don’t make me shake my rake more violently than I am currently shaking it!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Go out into the rain and shake your rake. Imagine shouting your demand at the sky as the rain pelts you from above.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Now imagine the rain changing. Wait a second, this isn't rain, it's juice (じゅ)! You shake your rake harder, and demand that the juice rain continues. It doesn't listen to your demands and stops as soon as you start bottling it. Well, at least you have enough for one, really small juice box.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture yourself demanding more rain from the sky, trying to fill up your tiny juice box with what little juice rain you were able to get.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: rain (⻗) and a rake (而) are both needed
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When it rains, the need for combs goes up to deal with wet hair.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscription from " rain " to " heaven " means that it is raining outside, which is unfavorable to travel. You have to stand and wait for the rain to finish. "Said Wen": "Need, 𩓣 also. In case of rain, do not advance and stop 𩓣 also. From the rain, but the sound. "Yi" said: The cloud is above the sky, the need." The word " need " means waiting is gradually used less, but used instead The word " must " is used to indicate, so the " must " that the later generations must wait for is a phony loan of " need ". " Need " is also the fifth hexagram in the sixty-four hexagrams. The shape of the hexagram is dry downhill, "Yi. "Need": ""Xiang" said: "The cloud is above the sky, the need." Kong Yingdashu: "The cloud is above the sky, it is the sky's desire for rain, waiting for time to fall."

From the meaning of waiting, " need " has the meaning of need and demand , "Zhaojun is out of the fortress": "Only for Mao to prolong his life the day before yesterday, referring to Danqing, all in need of gold and silk."

It is said that " need " is the original text of "濡", the original meaning is to wet the body (Lin Yiguang). When things get wet, they are soft and sagging. Therefore, the extension refers to softness. If a person's will is not strong, it is also a kind of weakness. Therefore, " cowardice " is used as a symbol of " need " and refers to cowardice.

The false name of Clementine is " glutinous ", which means glutinous rice. Uncle and father's 簠: "It is necessary to use (glutinous) glutinous rice to make (swell) rice", which means that it is used to hold glutinous rice, rice, glutinous rice, and other grains. Also used as the name of the country, Meng Gui: "I don't need to send Zhongzheng in the text of Mao Gong." "Qian Zhong" is the name of Mao Gong, which means that my father and Mao Gong do not need to conquer the war.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are called " Confucianism ." "Rong Chengshi" Jane 2: "Break the beast (guard) the door, 𢼲 (dwarf) needs (ru) as the target", which means that the lame person is responsible for keeping the door, and the dwarf is responsible for making arrows. It is also known as "濡", which means to get wet, "Shangbo Zhushu III. Zhouyi Jian 57: "Need (濡) not (its) first", which means wet head.
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscriptions from the " rain " to the " heaven ", it means that it is not suitable to travel on rainy days and to be treated. The original meaning is that you can't go out when it rains, you have to stop and wait.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「雨」從「天」，表示外面下雨，不利出行，得站着等待雨下完。《說文》：「需，𩓣也。遇雨不進止𩓣也。从雨，而聲。《易》曰：雲上於天，需。」「需」字等待的意思漸漸少用，反而用「須」來表示，故後世須待的「須」是「需」的假借字。「需」亦是六十四卦中的第五卦，卦形為乾下坎上，《易．需》：「《象》曰：『雲上於天，需。』」孔穎達疏：「雲上於天，是天之欲雨，待時而落。」

　　從等待之義引申，「需」有需要、索取之義，《昭君出塞》：「只為前日毛延壽，指寫丹青，遍需金帛。」

　　一說「需」是「濡」的初文，本義是淋濕身體（林義光）。事物沾濕則柔軟下垂，故引申指柔軟，人的意志不堅強也是一種柔弱，故「懦」從「需」為意符，指懦弱。

　　金文通假為「糯」，表示糯米，伯公父簠：「用成（盛）𥼚稻需（糯）粱」，表示用來盛載𥼚、稻、糯、粱等各種穀米。又用作國名，孟簋：「朕文考眔毛公遣仲征無需」，「遣仲」是毛公的名字，意謂我有文德的先父與毛公遣仲征伐無需。

　　戰國竹簡通假為「儒」，《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡2：「破躃獸（守）門，𢼲（侏）需（儒）為矢」，意謂腳瘸之人負責守門，矮子負責造箭。又通假為「濡」，表示弄濕，《上博竹書三．周易》簡57：「需（濡）丌（其）首」，意謂濡濕了頭。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「雨」從「天」，會雨天不宜出行而有所待之意。本義是下雨不能出門，得停下來等待。

需
Pinyin: xū
English Definition: to require; to need; to want; necessity; need
Total strokes: 14; Radical: 雨
Ideographic: Rain 雨 needed for crops to grow
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 雨 [ yǔ ] rain
    • 而 [ ér ] and, and then, and yet; but

需求 [ xū qiú ]: requirement; to require; (economics) demand
急需 [ jí xū ]: to urgently need; urgent need
内需 [ nèi xū ]: domestic demand
必需 [ bì xū ]: to need; to require; essential; indispensable

金文從「 雨 」從「 天 」，表示外面下雨，不利出行，得站着等待雨下完。《說文》：「需，𩓣也。遇雨不進止𩓣也。从雨，而聲。《易》曰：雲上於天，需。」「 需 」字等待的意思漸漸少用，反而用「 須 」來表示，故後世須待的「 須 」是「 需 」的假借字。「 需 」亦是六十四卦中的第五卦，卦形為乾下坎上，《易．需》：「《象》曰：『雲上於天，需。』」孔穎達疏：「雲上於天，是天之欲雨，待時而落。」 從等待之義引申，「 需 」有需要、索取之義，《昭君出塞》：「只為前日毛延壽，指寫丹青，遍需金帛。」 一說「 需 」是「 濡 」的初文，本義是淋濕身體（林義光）。事物沾濕則柔軟下垂，故引申指柔軟，人的意志不堅強也是一種柔弱，故「 懦 」從「 需 」為意符，指懦弱。 金文通假為「 糯 」，表示糯米，伯公父簠：「用成（盛）𥼚稻需（糯）粱」，表示用來盛載𥼚、稻、糯、粱等各種穀米。又用作國名，孟簋：「朕文考眔毛公遣仲征無需」，「遣仲」是毛公的名字，意謂我有文德的先父與毛公遣仲征伐無需。 戰國竹簡通假為「 儒 」，《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡2：「破躃獸（守）門，𢼲（侏）需（儒）為矢」，意謂腳瘸之人負責守門，矮子負責造箭。又通假為「 濡 」，表示弄濕，《上博竹書三．周易》簡57：「需（濡）丌（其）首」，意謂濡濕了頭。
Elaboration: The inscription from " rain" to " heaven" means that it is raining outside, which is unfavorable to travel. You have to stand and wait for the rain to finish. "Said Wen": "Need, 𩓣 also. In case of rain, do not advance and stop 𩓣 also. From the rain, but the sound. "Yi" said: The cloud is above the sky, the need." The word " need" means waiting is gradually used less, but used instead The word " must" is used to indicate, so the " must" that the later generations must wait for is a phony loan of " need". " Need" is also the fifth hexagram in the sixty-four hexagrams. The shape of the hexagram is dry downhill, "Yi. "Need": ""Xiang" said: "The cloud is above the sky, the need." Kong Yingdashu: "The cloud is above the sky, it is the sky's desire for rain, waiting for time to fall." From the meaning of waiting, " need" has the meaning of need and demand, "Zhaojun is out of the fortress": "Only for Mao to prolong his life the day before yesterday, referring to Danqing, all in need of gold and silk." It is said that " need" is the original text of " 濡", the original meaning is to wet the body (Lin Yiguang). When things get wet, they are soft and sagging. Therefore, the extension refers to softness. If a person's will is not strong, it is also a kind of weakness. Therefore, " cowardice" is used as a symbol of " need" and refers to cowardice. The false name of Clementine is " glutinous", which means glutinous rice. Uncle and father's 簠: "It is necessary to use (glutinous) glutinous rice to make (swell) rice", which means that it is used to hold glutinous rice, rice, glutinous rice, and other grains. Also used as the name of the country, Meng Gui: "I don't need to send Zhongzheng in the text of Mao Gong." "Qian Zhong" is the name of Mao Gong, which means that my father and Mao Gong do not need to conquer the war. The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are called " Confucianism." "Rong Chengshi" Jane 2: "Break the beast (guard) the door, 𢼲 (dwarf) needs (ru) as the target", which means that the lame person is responsible for keeping the door, and the dwarf is responsible for making arrows. It is also known as " 濡", which means to get wet, "Shangbo Zhushu III. Zhouyi Jian 57: "Need (濡) not (its) first", which means wet head.

：应该有，必须有；必须要用的物资。需求，需要，必需，急需。

need
Name meaning
: There should be, there must be; the materials that must be used. Needs, needs, needs, urgent needs.
xū
1) потребность, необходимость; нужда; спрос
接需分配 распределять (распределение) по потребностям
不时之需 непредвиденная потребность
需给 (jǐ) спрос и предложение (снабжение)
2) предмет необходимости; потребное, нужное
公家百需 всё необходимое казне
军需 нужды армии, необходимое для войск, предмет интендантского снабжения
3) нерешительность, медлительность
需, 事之贼也 нерешительность - враг дела
4) нуждаться в (чем-л.); требоваться; необходимо, нужно
需款甚巨 нужны большие средства
需人参加工作 необходимо, чтобы люди участвовали в труде
-----
1) Сюй (фамилия)
2) Сюй (5-я из 64 гексаграмм «Ицзина», «Необходимость ждать»)
3) вм. 儒 (слабый, робкий, нерешительный)
4) вм. 软 (мягкий, нежный, слабый)
5) вм. 懦
Radicals: 雨, 而  (rain, rake)
Meaning Mnemonic
In the rain I take my rake and shake it, making a demand that the rain stop! I demand this rain stop right now! Don’t make me shake my rake more violently than I am currently shaking it!
Go out into the rain and shake your rake. Imagine shouting your demand at the sky as the rain pelts you from above.
Reading Mnemonic
Now imagine the rain changing. Wait a second, this isn't rain, it's juice (じゅ)! You shake your rake harder, and demand that the juice rain continues. It doesn't listen to your demands and stops as soon as you start bottling it. Well, at least you have enough for one, really small juice box.
Picture yourself demanding more rain from the sky, trying to fill up your tiny juice box with what little juice rain you were able to get.

而 (грабли), 雨 (дождь)
